alert.note: Alert for Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 27 at 9:18PM MDT until April 28 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 6 inches with highest amounts above 6500 feet. Poor visibility at times in blowing snow. * WHERE...Castle Rock. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Roads will likely become slick and hazardous. Snow and blowing snow may reduce visibility to a quarter mile or less.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org.

area.areaDesc: Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet
